Essay on moral and religious education in domestic life,
Democracy according to the Buddhist viewpoint.
The analogy of religion, natural and revealed to the constitution and course of nature.

Christ, the pupil of Buddha; a comparative study.
Sex worship; an exposition of the Phallic origin of religion.

Inaugural address, delivered November 20, 1902.

The past and present position of the Church; an address delivered on the occasion of laying the corner-stone of Christ Church, Lexington, Ky., on Wednesday, the 17th of March, 1847.

results.title: The principles and government of the Christian Church; also, A directory for the worship of God.

contributor: great britain. parliament. house of lords
results.title: The Scottish Church appeal case: the decision of the House of Lords, the appeal of the Free Church sustained by five to two, August 1, 1904; full text of the judgments.
Immortality of the soul voiced by nature, and, Christianity in accord with science.
The Gospel in pagan religions; some thoughts suggested by the World's Parliament of Religions to an orthodox Christian.
Le Nouveau Testament de Notre Seigneur Jésus Christ,
The ciphers of the Apocalypse; the great prophetic scriptural cryptogram that is woven into the Revelation,
Beiträge zur praktischen Behandlung der biblischen Geschichte; Altes Testament.
The book opened; or, An analysis of the Bible.

A vocabulary of the Pentateuch; containing all the words of the five books in their primitive forms, with an English translation; followed by an alphabetical index of the Hebrew words, with references to the page where each may be found in the vocabulary, designed as a classbook, and at the same time to answer the purpose of a school dictionary. To which is prefixed, A synopsis of Hebrew grammar, to facilitate the study for beginners.

A dissertation of Nebuchadnezzar's dream ... also, The rise and faith of the most notable orthodox societies of the present day; together with A synopsis of the origin and faith of the Church of Latter-Day Saints, comparing their faith with the faith of other societies.

partof: rare book and special collections division
results.title: An address delivered before the Bible Society of the University of Virginia, May 13th, 1836.
Potešenie hriéšnika; náboženské kázne o umučení a vzkriesení Ježiša Krista.
His birthday.
Jesus our friend; the life of Christ told in picture, song and story.
The divine origin of Christianity.

Three essays on important subjects: Essay first, on the true divinity of Jesus Christ, the Son of God; essay second, On the unalterable love of God ..., essay third, On the Gospel ordinance of believers' baptism by immersion, with several pieces of original poetry. To which is prefixed An account of God's dealings with the author, and a dedication of himself to God and his work.
Skepticism assailed; or, Foundations of faith; being a trained lawyer's investigation of the truth of the Bible and Divinity of Christ.

featured_items.title: Candrian's State highways auto guide with auto-grams.
How to catch and how to run bases.
Tourists' manual and book of information of value to all bicyclers.
Susquehanna legends : collected in central Pennsylvania.
A dog's life by Tige : army cartoons and comic history of our boys in France.
Billets and bullets of 37 division; cartoons and ragtime.
Missouri of to-day; progress and prospects of the great commercial state and center of population
The Confederate spy: or, Startling incidents of the war between the states. A novel.
Was it a murder; or, who is the heir?
Detective Johnson of New Orleans. A tale of love and crime.
The question of the transfer of the Indian Bureau to the War Department
Navy blue : a story of cadet life in the United States Naval Academy at Annapolis.
The wrestler of Philippi; a tale of the early Christians
When wilderness was king; a tale of the Illinois country.
Moby Dick, or the white whale.
